trans-unit.source: The base <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl" /> class is an abstract class from which concrete text-based controls are derived.
trans-unit.target: A classe base <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl" /> é uma classe abstrata da qual controles concretos baseados em texto são derivados.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis ASP.NET, consulte o site [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextBox>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Label>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Link>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> controls are examples of controls derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextBox>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Label>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Link>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> controles são exemplos de controles que derivam de <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl> classe.

trans-unit.source: Every control that is based on the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl> class has a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> property, which can be programmatically modified.
trans-unit.target: Cada controle que se baseia o <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl> classe tiver um <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> propriedade, que pode ser modificada programaticamente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> property is usually used to render the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> propriedade normalmente é usada para renderizar o controle.

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: para operação em um ambiente hospedado.
Valor de demanda: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; valor de permissão: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl" />.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis ASP.NET, consulte o site [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900).

trans-unit.source: Sets or returns the text for the control.
trans-unit.target: Define ou retorna o texto do controle.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis ASP.NET, consulte o site [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900).

trans-unit.source: For an object that inherits the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> property from the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl> class, this property renders the text of the control.
trans-unit.target: Para um objeto que herda o <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> propriedade a partir de <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl> classe, essa propriedade renderiza o texto do controle.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> property can be specified by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> attribute, or as inner text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> propriedade pode ser especificada usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> atributo, ou como texto interno.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> property is specified in both ways, the inner text always takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> propriedade for especificada em ambos os modos, o texto interno sempre terá precedência.

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> property is programmatically set, the inner text is automatically removed and the newly set property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se o <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> propriedade é definida por meio de programação, o texto interno é removido automaticamente e recentemente defina propriedade terá precedência.
